text: Surge Rocks () are a group of five rocks, two always exposed, lying southwest of Eichorst Island and south-southeast of Bonaparte Point, Anvers Island. The name was suggested by Palmer Station personnel in 1972. Ocean swells working on the shoal surrounding these rocks, cause breaking and a "surge" of the water level in any weather condition. ==References== Category:Rock formations of the Palmer Archipelago
title: Surge Rocks
